name: Funny Card
description:
What could be better than a relaxing game with pleasant music. Match each image with a pair. Nice graphics are the best companion.

Funny Card is a matchmaking game. Immerse yourself in a relaxing yet intellectually entertaining game. When picking up a pair, do not forget about the time, it is limited.

Features of the game:
- Many levels
- Memory Training
- Relaxing music
- Nice Pixel-Art
